2278320139.title: minecraft:mountain_parameters - steep_material_adjustment settings
2278320139.description: Defines surface material for steep slopes

material.description: Block type use as steep material

471566442.title: Biome Components
471566442.description: Any components that this Biome uses

minecraft:capped_surface.description: Generates surface on blocks with non-solid blocks above or below.

minecraft:creature_spawn_probability.description: Probability that creatures will spawn within the biome when a chunk is generated.

minecraft:overworld_generation_rules.description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the overworld.

minecraft:climate.description: Describes temperature, humidity, precipitation, and similar. Biomes without this component will have default values.

minecraft:mesa_surface.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds colored strata and optional pillars.

minecraft:mountain_parameters.description: Noise parameters used to drive mountain terrain generation in Overworld.

minecraft:multinoise_generation_rules.description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the nether.

minecraft:overworld_height.description: Noise parameters used to drive terrain height in the Overworld.

minecraft:surface_material_adjustments.description: Specify fine-detail changes to blocks used in terrain generation (based on a noise function).

minecraft:surface_parameters.description: Controls the blocks used for the default Minecraft Overworld terrain generation.

minecraft:replace_biomes.description: Replaces a specified portion of one or more Minecraft biomes.

minecraft:swamp_surface.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds swamp surface details.

minecraft:the_end_surface.description: Use default Minecraft End terrain generation.

minecraft:tags.description: Attach arbitrary string tags to this biome.

910282102.title: minecraft:capped_surface
910282102.description: Generates surface on blocks with non-solid blocks above or below.

beach_material.description: Material used to decorate surface near sea level.

floor_materials.description: Materials used for the surface floor.

items.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

ceiling_materials.description: Materials used for the surface ceiling.

items.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

foundation_material.description: Material used to replace solid blocks that are not surface blocks.

sea_material.description: Material used to replace air blocks below sea level.

2586207614.title: minecraft:overworld_generation_rules - Weighted biome names settings
2586207614.description: Can be just the string name of a Biome, or an array of any size. If an array, each entry can be a Biome name string, or an array of size 2, where the first entry is a Biome name and the second entry is a positive integer representing how that Biome is weighted against other entries. If no weight is provided, a weight of 1 is used.

3263934683.title: minecraft:surface_material_adjustments - surface adjustment settings
3263934683.description: An adjustment to generated terrain, replacing blocks based on the specified settings.

materials.description: The specific blocks used for this surface adjustment

noise_range.description: Defines a range of noise values [min, max] for which this adjustment should be applied.

height_range.description: Defines a range of noise values [min, max] for which this adjustment should be applied.

items.description: A JSON field that specifies a Molang expression. Can be an integer, float, boolean, or string.

noise_frequency_scale.description: The scale to multiply by the position when accessing the noise value for the material adjustments.

mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome

sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur

sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome

sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome

top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome

foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome

3076687790.title: Block Specifier
3076687790.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

states.description: Contains members named after each state, with boolean, integer, or string values.

70508991.title: minecraft:overworld_generation_rules
70508991.description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the overworld.

mutate_transformation.description: What biome to switch to when converting to a mutated biome

hills_transformation.description: What biome to switch to when converting to a hilly biome

generate_for_climates.description: Controls the world generation climate categories that this biome can spawn for. A single biome can be associated with multiple categories with different weightings.

items.description: An array of any size containing arrays of exactly two elements. For each contained array, the first element is a climate category string ('medium', 'warm', 'lukewarm', 'cold', or 'frozen'). The second element is a positive integer for how much that entry is weighted relative to other entries.

river_transformation.description: What biome to switch to when converting to a river biome (if not the Vanilla 'river' biome)

shore_transformation.description: What biome to switch to when adjacent to an ocean biome

6061611.title: minecraft:creature_spawn_probability
6061611.description: Probability that creatures will spawn within the biome when a chunk is generated.

probability.description: Probabiltity between [0.0, 0.75] of creatures spawning within the biome on chunk generation.

891697368.title: minecraft:overworld_generation_rules - Weighted climate categories settings
891697368.description: An array of any size containing arrays of exactly two elements. For each contained array, the first element is a climate category string ('medium', 'warm', 'lukewarm', 'cold', or 'frozen'). The second element is a positive integer for how much that entry is weighted relative to other entries.

2053063253.title: minecraft:the_end_surface
2053063253.description: Use default Minecraft End terrain generation.

800202529.title: minecraft:climate
800202529.description: Describes temperature, humidity, precipitation, and similar. Biomes without this component will have default values.

blue_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

downfall.description: Amount that precipitation affects colors and block changes

snow_accumulation.description: Minimum and maximum snow level, each multiple of 0.125 is another snow layer

white_ash.description: Density of white ash precipitation visuals

temperature.description: Temperature affects a variety of visual and behavioral things, including snow and ice placement, sponge drying, and sky color

red_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

1174814411.title: minecraft:mesa_surface
1174814411.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds colored strata and optional pillars.

sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur

mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome

sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome

foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome

top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome

sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome

bryce_pillars.description: Whether the mesa generates with pillars

has_forest.description: Places coarse dirt and grass at high altitudes

4185018795.title: minecraft:mountain_parameters
4185018795.description: Noise parameters used to drive mountain terrain generation in Overworld.

steep_material_adjustment.description: Defines surface material for steep slopes

top_slide.description: Controls the density tapering that happens at the top of the world to prevent terrain from reaching too high

73298661.title: Molang Expression
73298661.description: A JSON field that specifies a Molang expression. Can be an integer, float, boolean, or string.

3848407258.title: minecraft:mountain_parameters - top_slide settings
3848407258.description: Controls the density tapering that happens at the top of the world to prevent terrain from reaching too high.

enabled.description: If false, top slide will be disabled. If true, other parameters will be taken into account.

458645028.title: minecraft:multinoise_generation_rules
458645028.description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the nether.

target_weirdness.description: Weirdness with which this biome should be generated, relative to other biomes.

target_temperature.description: Temperature with which this biome should be generated, relative to other biomes.

target_humidity.description: Humidity with which this biome should be generated, relative to other biomes.

target_altitude.description: Altitude with which this biome should be generated, relative to other biomes.

weight.description: Weight with which this biome should be generated, relative to other biomes.

1042742755.title: minecraft:overworld_height
1042742755.description: Noise parameters used to drive terrain height in the Overworld.

noise_type.title: Noise Type
noise_type.description: Specifies a preset based on a built-in setting rather than manually using noise_params

noise_params.description: First value is depth - more negative means deeper underwater, while more positive means higher. Second value is scale, which affects how much noise changes as it moves from the surface.

3704131722.title: minecraft:surface_material_adjustments
3704131722.description: Specify fine-detail changes to blocks used in terrain generation (based on a noise function).

adjustments.description: All adjustments that match the column's noise values will be applied in the order listed.

items.description: An adjustment to generated terrain, replacing blocks based on the specified settings.

1287813091.title: minecraft:surface_material_adjustments - surface adjustment materials settings
1287813091.description: The specific blocks used for this surface adjustment

sea_material.description: Controls the block type used in the bodies of water in this biome when this adjustment is active.

foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome when this adjustment is active.

top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome when this adjustment is active.

mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome when this adjustment is active.

sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome when this adjustment is active.

1167427373.title: minecraft:surface_parameters
1167427373.description: Controls the blocks used for the default Minecraft Overworld terrain generation.

mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome.

sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur.

sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome.

top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome.

foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome.

416340115.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds swamp surface details.

sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

320104782.title: minecraft:replace_biomes
320104782.description: Replaces a specified portion of one or more Minecraft biomes.

replacements.description: List of biome replacement configurations. Retroactively adding a new replacement to the front of this list will cause the world generation to change. Please add any new replacements to the end of the list.

items.description: Represents the replacement information used to determine the placement of the overriding biome.

716969038.title: Biome Replacement
716969038.description: Represents the replacement information used to determine the placement of the overriding biome.

dimension.description: Dimension in which this replacement can happen. Must be 'minecraft:overworld'.

targets.description: Biomes that are going to be replaced by the overriding biome. Target biomes must not contain namespaces.

amount.description: Noise value used to determine whether or not the replacement is attempted, similar to a percentage. Must be in the range (0.0, 1.0].

noise_frequency_scale.description: Scaling value used to alter the frequency of replacement attempts. A lower frequency will mean a bigger contiguous biome area that occurs less often. A higher frequency will mean smaller contiguous biome areas that occur more often. Must be in the range (0.0, 100.0].

3315029981.title: minecraft:tags
3315029981.description: Attach arbitrary string tags to this biome.

tags.description: Array of string tags used by other systems such as entity spawning

2794612011.title: Biome Description
2794612011.description: Contains non-component settings for a Biome.

identifier.description: The name of the Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Identifiers should only be lowercase.

title: Biome Definition
description: Contains a description and components to define a Biome.

description.description: Non-component settings, including the Biome name.
